hero.name: Modhaf AlHarthi
hero.title: Lawyer and consultant with experience in law, business, and corporate development.

about.right_title: Modhaf AlHarthi lawyer and business consultant
about.left_paragraph_1: Extensive experience of over 20 years in providing comprehensive legal solutions and strategic consulting for organizations. I hold bachelor's degrees in both Computer Science and Law, offering a multidisciplinary perspective for problem-solving and business development.
about.left_paragraph_2: Throughout my career, I have held leadership positions across various sectors, including contracting, technology, and corporate services. I currently serve as the Chairman of the Board at Etmaam for Services, where I lead the company's strategic direction toward innovation and enhanced organizational efficiency.

vision.left_paragraph: This text is an example of a title that is placed in the place that shows the length of a paragraph for a specific title that explains content that extends over several lines in this way and is made up of several sentences. Thus, we have an example of a paragraph.

career_path.career_title: Over the years, Iâ€™ve held leadership roles and provided strategic consulting to drive business growth and team development.

career_item.title: Chairman of the Board
career_item.paragraph: At Etmaam for Services, I provide strategic leadership and work with the board of directors to achieve the company's goals, leveraging my experience to support and develop the team.

career_item.title: Business Consultant
career_item.paragraph: At Awan Hotels Group, I provided strategic guidance to improve operations and support sustainable growth.

career_item.title: Head
career_item.paragraph: Zilal Al Khaleej General Contracting Company

career_item.title: Head of Department
career_item.paragraph: At Faster Company Limited, I was responsible for supervising departments, managing budgets, coordinating teams, creating new departments, and ensuring efficient overall management.

career_item.title: Business Consultant
career_item.paragraph: At ASBIS Middle East, I provided enterprise and organizational consulting to help improve business structure, streamline operations, and enhance overall efficiency.
